author: Vertyco
end_user_data_statement:
This cog stores Discord ID's and Gamertags and uses Selenium to web-scrape the halotracker.com site for Halo Infinite stats
**WARNING**
Requires Google Chrome to be installed on server hosting the bot!
install_msg:
Thank you for installing HaloStats! type `[p]help HaloStats` to see all commands.
**WARNING**
Requires Google Chrome to be installed on server hosting the bot!
